trans-unit.source: Represents security information for the current HTTP request, including role membership.
trans-unit.target: 表示为当前 HTTP 请求，包括角色成员身份的安全信息。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 此类不能被继承。

trans-unit.source: The RolePrincipal object implements the <xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal> interface and represents the current security context for the HTTP request.
trans-unit.target: RolePrincipal 对象实现<xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal>接口，并在表示 HTTP 请求的当前安全上下文。</xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal>

trans-unit.source: When role management is enabled (see <xref:System.Web.Security.Roles>), the <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule> assigns a RolePrincipal object to the <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Current%2A><xref:System.Web.HttpContext>.
trans-unit.target: 启用角色管理后 (请参阅<xref:System.Web.Security.Roles>)， <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule>RolePrincipal 将对象分配给<xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A>属性的<xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Current%2A><xref:System.Web.HttpContext>。</xref:System.Web.HttpContext></xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Current%2A> </xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A> </xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule> </xref:System.Web.Security.Roles>

trans-unit.source: The RolePrincipal class exposes the security identity for the current HTTP request and additionally performs checks for role membership.
trans-unit.target: RolePrincipal 类公开为当前 HTTP 请求的安全标识和另外的角色成员身份进行检查。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.CacheRolesInCookie%2A> is `true`, then the RolePrincipal object manages the cached list of roles and looks up role membership for the current user in the cached list first, then the role <xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.Provider%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.CacheRolesInCookie%2A>是`true`，RolePrincipal 对象管理的角色的缓存的列表，然后查找中已缓存的当前用户的角色成员身份列表前，然后角色<xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.Provider%2A>.</xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.Provider%2A> </xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.CacheRolesInCookie%2A>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.CacheRolesInCookie%2A> is `false`, the RolePrincipal object always looks up role membership using the role provider.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.CacheRolesInCookie%2A>是`false`，RolePrincipal 对象始终查找使用角色提供程序的角色成员身份。</xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.CacheRolesInCookie%2A>

trans-unit.source: The RolePrincipal object encrypts and decrypts role information cached in the cookie identified by the <xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.CookieName%2A> based on the <xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.CookieProtectionValue%2A>.
trans-unit.target: RolePrincipal 对象进行加密和解密在由<xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.CookieName%2A>基于<xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.CookieProtectionValue%2A>.</xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.CookieProtectionValue%2A></xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.CookieName%2A>标识的 cookie 中缓存的角色信息

trans-unit.source: Instantiates a object for the specified identity.
trans-unit.target: 实例化的指定对象的 identity 。

trans-unit.source: This overload of the RolePrincipal constructor creates a new <xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal> object and initializes its property values.
trans-unit.target: 此重载 RolePrincipal 构造函数创建一个新<xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal>对象并初始化它的属性值。</xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal>

trans-unit.source: Cached role information is not read from the cookie identified by the <xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.CookieName%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 从由标识的 cookie 不读取缓存的角色信息<xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.CookieName%2A>属性。</xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.CookieName%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal.ProviderName%2A> property is set to the <xref:System.Configuration.Provider.ProviderBase.Name%2A> of the default role provider.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal.ProviderName%2A>属性设置为<xref:System.Configuration.Provider.ProviderBase.Name%2A>的默认角色提供程序。</xref:System.Configuration.Provider.ProviderBase.Name%2A> </xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal.ProviderName%2A>

trans-unit.source: For information on enabling role management, see the <xref:System.Web.Security.Roles> class.
trans-unit.target: 有关启用角色管理的信息，请参阅<xref:System.Web.Security.Roles>类。</xref:System.Web.Security.Roles>

trans-unit.source: The user identity to create the <xref href="System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal"></xref> for.
trans-unit.target: 要创建的用户标识<xref href="System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal"></xref>有关。

trans-unit.source: identity is .
trans-unit.target: identityis .

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal"></xref> class using information that is contained in the specified <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> object and using the specified streaming context.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal"></xref>类使用包含的信息中指定<xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref>对象，并使用指定的流上下文。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> object to populate with data.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref>要填充数据的对象。

trans-unit.source: The destination for this serialization.
trans-unit.target: 此序列化的目标。

trans-unit.source: Instantiates a object for the specified identity with role information from the specified encryptedTicket.
trans-unit.target: 实例化的指定对象的 identity 与从指定的角色信息 encryptedTicket 。

trans-unit.source: This overload of the RolePrincipal constructor creates a new <xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal> object and initializes its property values.
trans-unit.target: 此重载 RolePrincipal 构造函数创建一个新<xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal>对象并初始化它的属性值。</xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal>

trans-unit.source: Role information for the current user is read from the supplied `encryptedTicket` and cached with the <xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal> object.
trans-unit.target: 读取为当前用户的角色信息从提供`encryptedTicket`和缓存使用<xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal>对象。</xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal.ProviderName%2A> property is set to the <xref:System.Configuration.Provider.ProviderBase.Name%2A> of the default role provider.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal.ProviderName%2A>属性设置为<xref:System.Configuration.Provider.ProviderBase.Name%2A>的默认角色提供程序。</xref:System.Configuration.Provider.ProviderBase.Name%2A> </xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal.ProviderName%2A>

trans-unit.source: For information on enabling role management, see the <xref:System.Web.Security.Roles> class.
trans-unit.target: 有关启用角色管理的信息，请参阅<xref:System.Web.Security.Roles>类。</xref:System.Web.Security.Roles>

trans-unit.source: The user identity to create the <xref href="System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal"></xref> for.
trans-unit.target: 要创建的用户标识<xref href="System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal"></xref>有关。

trans-unit.source: A string that contains encrypted role information.
trans-unit.target: 包含加密的角色信息的字符串。

trans-unit.source: identity is .
trans-unit.target: identityis .

trans-unit.source: -or- encryptedTicket is .
trans-unit.target: -or- encryptedTicket is .

trans-unit.source: Instantiates a object for the specified identity using the specified providerName.
trans-unit.target: 实例化的指定对象的 identity 使用指定 providerName 。

trans-unit.source: This overload of the RolePrincipal constructor creates a new <xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal> object and initializes its property values.
trans-unit.target: 此重载 RolePrincipal 构造函数创建一个新<xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal>对象并初始化它的属性值。</xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal.ProviderName%2A> property is set to the value specified in the `providerName` parameter.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal.ProviderName%2A>属性设置中指定的值为`providerName`参数。</xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal.ProviderName%2A>

trans-unit.source: For information on enabling role management, see the <xref:System.Web.Security.Roles> class.
trans-unit.target: 有关启用角色管理的信息，请参阅<xref:System.Web.Security.Roles>类。</xref:System.Web.Security.Roles>

trans-unit.source: The name of the role provider for the user.
trans-unit.target: 用户角色提供程序的名称。

trans-unit.source: The user identity to create the <xref href="System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal"></xref> for.
trans-unit.target: 要创建的用户标识<xref href="System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal"></xref>有关。

trans-unit.source: identity is .
trans-unit.target: identityis .

trans-unit.source: providerName is .
trans-unit.target: providerNameis .

trans-unit.source: -or- providerName refers to a role provider that does not exist in the configuration for the application.
trans-unit.target: -或-providerName指应用程序的配置中不存在角色提供程序。

trans-unit.source: Instantiates a object for the specified identity using the specified providerName and role information from the specified encryptedTicket.
trans-unit.target: 实例化的指定对象的 identity 使用指定 providerName 和从指定的角色信息 encryptedTicket 。

trans-unit.source: This overload of the <xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal.%23ctor%2A> constructor creates a new <xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal> object and initializes its property values.
trans-unit.target: 此重载<xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal.%23ctor%2A>构造函数创建一个新<xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal>对象并初始化它的属性值。</xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal> </xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: Role information for the current user is read from the supplied `encryptedTicket` and cached with the <xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal> object.
trans-unit.target: 读取为当前用户的角色信息从提供`encryptedTicket`和缓存使用<xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal>对象。</xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal.ProviderName%2A> property is set to the value specified in the `providerName` parameter.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal.ProviderName%2A>属性设置中指定的值为`providerName`参数。</xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal.ProviderName%2A>

trans-unit.source: For information on enabling role management, see the <xref:System.Web.Security.Roles> class.
trans-unit.target: 有关启用角色管理的信息，请参阅<xref:System.Web.Security.Roles>类。</xref:System.Web.Security.Roles>

trans-unit.source: The name of the role provider for the user.
trans-unit.target: 用户角色提供程序的名称。

trans-unit.source: The user identity to create the <xref href="System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal"></xref> for.
trans-unit.target: 要创建的用户标识<xref href="System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal"></xref>有关。

trans-unit.source: A string that contains encrypted role information.
trans-unit.target: 包含加密的角色信息的字符串。

trans-unit.source: identity is .
trans-unit.target: identityis .

trans-unit.source: -or- encryptedTicket is .
trans-unit.target: -or- encryptedTicket is .

trans-unit.source: providerName is .
trans-unit.target: providerNameis .

trans-unit.source: -or- providerName refers to a role provider that does not exist in the configuration for the application.
trans-unit.target: -或-providerName指应用程序的配置中不存在角色提供程序。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the list of role names cached with the <xref href="System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal"></xref> object has been modified.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示是否使用缓存的角色的名称的列表<xref href="System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal"></xref>修改对象。

trans-unit.source: The CachedListChanged property will return `true` after role names have been retrieved from the default role <xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.Provider%2A> and added to the cache by the <xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal.GetRoles%2A> method, or when the <xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal.IsInRole%2A> method calls the <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleProvider.IsUserInRole%2A> method of the default role provider and then receives a response of `true`, resulting in the role name passed to the <xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal.IsInRole%2A> method being added to the cache.
trans-unit.target: CachedListChanged 属性将返回`true`角色名称检索从默认角色后<xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.Provider%2A>和添加到缓存中，按<xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal.GetRoles%2A>方法，或当<xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal.IsInRole%2A>方法调用<xref:System.Web.Security.RoleProvider.IsUserInRole%2A>的默认角色提供程序的方法，然后接收的响应`true`，这会导致角色名称传递给中<xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal.IsInRole%2A>方法添加到缓存。</xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal.IsInRole%2A> </xref:System.Web.Security.RoleProvider.IsUserInRole%2A> </xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal.IsInRole%2A> </xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal.GetRoles%2A> </xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.Provider%2A>

trans-unit.source: The CachedListChanged property will also return true if <xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.CookieSlidingExpiration%2A> is set to `true` and the <xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal.ExpireDate%2A> has passed, resulting in a new <xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal.ExpireDate%2A> being set.
trans-unit.target: CachedListChanged 属性将还返回 true，如果<xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.CookieSlidingExpiration%2A>设置为`true`和<xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal.ExpireDate%2A>已传递，从而在新<xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal.ExpireDate%2A>设置。</xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal.ExpireDate%2A> </xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal.ExpireDate%2A> </xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.CookieSlidingExpiration%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the list of role names cached with the <xref href="System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal"></xref> object has been modified; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果使用缓存的角色的名称的列表<xref href="System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal"></xref>对象已修改; 否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the path for the cached role names cookie.
trans-unit.target: 获取缓存的角色名称 cookie 的路径。

trans-unit.source: The CookiePath property returns the value of the `cookiePath` attribute from the Web.config file for your ASP.NET application.
trans-unit.target: CookiePath 属性返回的值`cookiePath`从 ASP.NET 应用程序的 Web.config 文件的属性。

trans-unit.source: For more information on cookie paths, see <xref:System.Web.HttpCookie.Path%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 有关 cookie 路径的详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Web.HttpCookie.Path%2A>。</xref:System.Web.HttpCookie.Path%2A>

trans-unit.source: The path of the cookie where role names are cached.
trans-unit.target: 在其中缓存角色名称 cookie 的路径。

trans-unit.source: The default is /.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是 /。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the roles cookie has expired.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示是否角色 cookie 已过期。

trans-unit.source: The Expired property returns a `Boolean` value indicating whether the roles cookie has expired based on the <xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal.ExpireDate%2A> and the current date and time.
trans-unit.target: 已过期属性返回`Boolean`值，该值指示是否已过期角色 cookie 基于<xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal.ExpireDate%2A>和当前日期和时间。</xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal.ExpireDate%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the roles cookie has expired; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果角色 cookie 已过期;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the date and time when the roles cookie will expire.
trans-unit.target: 获取的日期和时间角色 cookie 何时将过期。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.DateTime> value when the roles cookie will expire.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.DateTime>值将在何时角色 cookie 过期。</xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: Populates a <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> object with the data that is required in order to serialize the target object using the specified streaming context.
trans-unit.target: 填充<xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref>对象则必须以使用指定的流式处理上下文目标对象序列化的数据。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable.GetObjectData%28System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo%2CSystem.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext%29> method.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable.GetObjectData%28System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo%2CSystem.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext%29>方法。</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable.GetObjectData%28System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo%2CSystem.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext%29>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> object to populate with data.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref>要填充数据的对象。

trans-unit.source: The destination for this serialization.
trans-unit.target: 此序列化的目标。

trans-unit.source: Gets a list of roles that the <xref href="System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal"></xref> is a member of.
trans-unit.target: 获取角色的列表<xref href="System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal"></xref>是的成员。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.CacheRolesInCookie%2A> is `true` and role names have been cached for the user represented by the <xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal>, then the GetRoles method will return the list of role names in the cache that the user is a member of.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.CacheRolesInCookie%2A>是`true`和表示的用户为已缓存角色名称<xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal>，然后 GetRoles 方法将返回用户所在的缓存的角色名称的列表。</xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal> </xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.CacheRolesInCookie%2A>

trans-unit.source: If role names have not been cached, then the GetRoles method returns the list of role names that the user is a member of from the default role <xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.Provider%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如果尚未缓存角色名称，然后 GetRoles 方法将返回用户是从默认角色<xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.Provider%2A>.</xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.Provider%2A>的成员的角色名称的列表

trans-unit.source: Only role names for the current <xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.ApplicationName%2A> are returned.
trans-unit.target: 仅为当前的角色名称<xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.ApplicationName%2A>返回。</xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.ApplicationName%2A>

trans-unit.source: To determine whether role names have been cached in the <xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal> object, check the <xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal.IsRoleListCached%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要确定是否已在缓存角色名称<xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal>对象，检查<xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal.IsRoleListCached%2A>属性。</xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal.IsRoleListCached%2A> </xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal>

trans-unit.source: The list of roles that the <xref href="System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal"></xref> is a member of.
trans-unit.target: 角色的列表， <xref href="System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal"> </xref>是的成员。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal.Identity*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal.Identity*>属性是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。</xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal.Identity*>

trans-unit.source: Gets the security identity for the current HTTP request.
trans-unit.target: 获取当前 HTTP 请求的安全标识。

trans-unit.source: The Identity of a <xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal> object is set when the <xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal> constructor is called.
trans-unit.target: 标识<xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal>对象设置时<xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal>调用构造函数。</xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal> </xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal>

trans-unit.source: The security identity for the current HTTP request.
trans-unit.target: 当前 HTTP 请求的安全标识。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the user represented by the <xref href="System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal"></xref> is in the specified role.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值表示的用户<xref href="System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal"></xref>是否属于指定角色。

trans-unit.source: IsInRole first checks the <xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal.IsRoleListCached%2A> property to determine whether a cached list of role names for the current user is available.
trans-unit.target: IsInRole 首先检查<xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal.IsRoleListCached%2A>属性来确定是否可缓存当前用户的角色名称的列表。</xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal.IsRoleListCached%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal.IsRoleListCached%2A> property is `true`, the cached list is checked for the specified role.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal.IsRoleListCached%2A>属性是`true`，为指定的角色会检查缓存的列表。</xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal.IsRoleListCached%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the IsInRole method finds the specified role in the cached list, it returns `true`.
trans-unit.target: 如果 IsInRole 方法在缓存的列表中找到指定的角色，它将返回`true`。

trans-unit.source: If IsInRole does not find the specified role, it calls the <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleProvider.GetRolesForUser%2A> method of the default <xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.Provider%2A> instance to determine whether the user name is associated with a role from the data source for the configured <xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.ApplicationName%2A> value.
trans-unit.target: 如果 IsInRole 未找到指定的角色，则会调用<xref:System.Web.Security.RoleProvider.GetRolesForUser%2A>方法的默认值<xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.Provider%2A>实例以确定用户名称是从数据源中为配置的角色相关联<xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.ApplicationName%2A>值。</xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.ApplicationName%2A> </xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.Provider%2A> </xref:System.Web.Security.RoleProvider.GetRolesForUser%2A>

trans-unit.source: The role to search for.
trans-unit.target: 要搜索的角色。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if user represented by the <xref href="System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal"></xref> is in the specified role; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果用户由表示<xref href="System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal"></xref>是否属于指定角色; 否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal.Identity*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal.Identity*>属性是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。</xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal.Identity*>

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the list of roles for the user has been cached in a cookie.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示是否已在 cookie 中缓存的角色的用户的列表。

trans-unit.source: If the `cacheRolesInCookie` attribute in the Web.config file for the application is set to `true`, then a list of role names for the current user is written to a cookie when user membership in a particular role is checked.
trans-unit.target: 如果`cacheRolesInCookie`属性在 Web.config 文件中的应用设置为`true`，则为当前用户的角色名称的列表写入 cookie 时检查特定角色中的用户成员身份。

trans-unit.source: The IsRoleListCached property indicates whether role names have been written to the cookie.
trans-unit.target: IsRoleListCached 属性指示角色名称是否已写入到 cookie。

trans-unit.source: Note that, even though the `cacheRolesInCookie` configuration attribute may be `true`, the IsRoleListCached property does not return `true` until after role information has been written to the cookie.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，即使`cacheRolesInCookie`配置属性可能为`true`，IsRoleListCached 属性不返回`true`直到角色信息已写入到 cookie 后。

trans-unit.source: If no role checks are performed for a user, IsRoleListCached will return `false`.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有相应的角色的用户执行检查，将返回 IsRoleListCached `false`。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if role names are cached in a cookie; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果在某个 cookie; 缓存角色名称，否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the date and time that the roles cookie was issued.
trans-unit.target: 获取的日期和颁发角色 cookie 的时间。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.DateTime> that the roles cookie was issued.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.DateTime>颁发角色 cookie。</xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the role provider that stores and retrieves role information for the user.
trans-unit.target: 获取用于存储和检索用户的角色信息的角色提供程序的名称。

trans-unit.source: The ProviderName property exposes the name of the role provider that manages the role information for the user represented by the <xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal> object.
trans-unit.target: ProviderName 属性公开管理所表示的用户角色信息的角色提供程序的名称<xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal>对象。</xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal>

trans-unit.source: This enables you to access the specific role-provider instance for a user by using the <xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.Providers%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.Security.Roles> class regardless of whether the provider is the default provider for the application.
trans-unit.target: 这使你可以通过访问用户的特定的角色提供程序实例<xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.Providers%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.Security.Roles>，无论是否提供程序的默认提供程序应用程序的类。</xref:System.Web.Security.Roles> </xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.Providers%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, you may create a method that takes a <xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal> as input and returns the list of roles for the represented user.
trans-unit.target: 例如，你可能创建一个带方法<xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal>作为输入，并返回所表示的用户角色的列表。</xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal>

trans-unit.source: You can ensure that the appropriate role provider is used to return the list of roles for the <xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal> by calling the <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleProvider.GetRolesForUser%2A> method of the role provider from the <xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.Providers%2A> collection that is indexed by the ProviderName property value.
trans-unit.target: 你可以确保相应的角色提供程序用于返回角色列表<xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal>通过调用<xref:System.Web.Security.RoleProvider.GetRolesForUser%2A>方法中的角色提供程序<xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.Providers%2A>按 ProviderName 属性值编制索引的集合。</xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.Providers%2A> </xref:System.Web.Security.RoleProvider.GetRolesForUser%2A> </xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal>

trans-unit.source: To populate the <xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal> object for each request, you must use a <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule.GetRoles> event handler defined in the Global.asax file for the application.
trans-unit.target: 若要填充<xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal>对象为每个请求必须使用<xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule.GetRoles>在应用程序的 Global.asax 文件中定义的事件处理程序。</xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule.GetRoles> </xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal>

trans-unit.source: The name of the role provider that stores and retrieves role information for the user.
trans-unit.target: 用于存储和检索用户的角色信息的角色提供程序名称。

trans-unit.source: Marks the cached role list as having been changed.
trans-unit.target: 将标记为已被更改的缓存的角色列表。

trans-unit.source: The SetDirty method marks the cached role list as having been changed by setting <xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal.CachedListChanged%2A> to `true` and <xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal.IsRoleListCached%2A> to `false`.
trans-unit.target: SetDirty 方法将标记为已通过设置已更改缓存的角色列表<xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal.CachedListChanged%2A>到`true`和<xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal.IsRoleListCached%2A>到`false`。</xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal.IsRoleListCached%2A> </xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal.CachedListChanged%2A>

trans-unit.source: For a description of this member, see <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializationSurrogate.GetObjectData*>.
trans-unit.target: 有关此成员的说明，请参阅<xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializationSurrogate.GetObjectData*>。</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializationSurrogate.GetObjectData*>

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit-interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 此成员是显式接口成员的实现。

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable> interface.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用它时，才<xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal>实例被强制转换为<xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable>接口。</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable> </xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> to populate with data.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref>要填充数据。

trans-unit.source: The destination for this serialization.
trans-unit.target: 此序列化的目标。

trans-unit.source: Returns the role information cached with the <xref href="System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal"></xref> object encrypted based on the <xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.CookieProtectionValue*>.
trans-unit.target: 返回与缓存的角色信息<xref href="System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal"></xref>对象加密基于<xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.CookieProtectionValue*>.</xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.CookieProtectionValue*>

trans-unit.source: The value returned by the ToEncryptedTicket method is stored in the roles cookie when <xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.CacheRolesInCookie%2A> is `true`.
trans-unit.target: ToEncryptedTicket 方法返回的值存储在角色 cookie 时<xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.CacheRolesInCookie%2A>是`true`。</xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.CacheRolesInCookie%2A>

trans-unit.source: The role information cached with the <xref href="System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal"></xref> object encrypted based on the <xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.CookieProtectionValue*>.
trans-unit.target: 使用缓存的角色信息<xref href="System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal"></xref>对象加密基于<xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.CookieProtectionValue*>.</xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.CookieProtectionValue*>

trans-unit.source: Gets the version number of the roles cookie.
trans-unit.target: 获取角色 cookie 的版本号。

trans-unit.source: By including a version number in the roles cookie, future releases of ASP.NET can modify the format of the roles cookie and use the Version property to distinguish between different formats.
trans-unit.target: 通过在角色 cookie 中包含的版本号，ASP.NET 的未来版本可以修改角色 cookie 的格式和版本属性用于区分不同的格式。

trans-unit.source: The version number of the roles cookie.
trans-unit.target: 角色 cookie 的版本号。
